name: Poofers Poofected - Fat
text: This card cannot be Xyz Summoned. If this card is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Reptile-Type monster from your hand or GY. When a Trap card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Poofers'' monster from your hand, field, or GY; negate that effect, and if you do, destroy that card. You can only activate each effect of "Poofers Poofected - Fat" once per turn.
